results.content: Welcome to the O2 messaging service. The person you are calling is unable to take your call. Please leave your message after the tone. To re-record your message, key hash at any time.

Hi, Adrian. It's Dan, Ream Interiors in Gillingham. I was just calling really just to see how you got on with the most recent revised quotation I've done for you. If you give us a callback in the showroom, failing that, I'll give you a call a little bit later. I'm gonna drop you an email as well, and, hopefully, I will speak to you soon. Cheers. Bye.
